languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс с грустной улыбкой качает головой.{/n} "Упорство, достойное куда лучшего применения, {name}".
{n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс с грустной улыбкой качает головой.{/n} "Упорство, достойное куда лучшего применения, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."

{n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."

languages.text: {n}海因里希摇了摇头，露出了哀伤的笑容。{/n}“你这股固执劲儿，真该用到更有用的地方，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希摇了摇头，露出了哀伤的笑容。{/n}“你这股固执劲儿，真该用到更有用的地方，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix niega con la cabeza y sonríe tristemente.{/n} «Debería dar mejor uso a esa tozudez, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix niega con la cabeza y sonríe tristemente.{/n} «Debería dar mejor uso a esa tozudez, {name}».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは悲しげな笑みを浮かべて首を振る。{/n}「そういう強情さは、もっとうまく扱うべきだ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは悲しげな笑みを浮かべて首を振る。{/n}「そういう強情さは、もっとうまく扱うべきだ、{name}」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix secoue la tête en souriant tristement.{/n} « Vous devriez utiliser cette obstination à meilleur escient, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix secoue la tête en souriant tristement.{/n} « Vous devriez utiliser cette obstination à meilleur escient, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf und lächelt dabei traurig.{/n} "Ihr solltet Euren Starrsinn besser nutzen, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf und lächelt dabei traurig.{/n} "Ihr solltet Euren Starrsinn besser nutzen, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, hüzünlü bir tebessümle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Böylesi bir inatçılığı daha iyi değerlendirmek gerek {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head with a sad smile.{/n} "Such obstinacy should be put to better use, {name}."
